synopses.small: Freddy Lupin is desperate to become a werewolf but transforms into a poodle instead.

synopses.editorial: Freddy Lupin is desperate to become a werewolf but transforms into a poodle instead.
synopses.small: Freddy Lupin is desperate to become a werewolf but transforms into a poodle instead.
Recounting the largest mass shooting in US history, the Las Vegas Harvest music festival.

synopses.editorial: 4/4 Searching for closure. Some survivors bond over events, others grieve differently
synopses.small: Many survivors still search for closure.
12 Puppies and Us charts the ups and downs of a dozen puppies and their families.
Bedlington Terrier Linus joins the Seymour family in Sussex, but mum Rebecca is worried.
It's 1933, and an older and greyer Hercule Poirot must take matters into his own hands.
Hercule faces a race against time as he realises that only he holds the key to the case.
The remarkable story of Alex Skeel who survived an abusive relationship.

initial_children.title: Abused By My Girlfriend
initial_children.editorial_subtitle: A teenage romance that led to terrible violence

synopses.editorial: The true story of Alex Skeel and the abusive relationship that left him days from death.
synopses.small: The remarkable story of Alex Skeel who survived an abusive relationship.
A true crime series following a young mother facing up to 99 years in prison for murder.

synopses.editorial: Rex and the prosecution engage in one final battle over Ashley's freedom.
synopses.small: Nearly five years after being arrested, Ashley arrives in court to discover her fate.
A dark and twisted take on Dickens' classic story, from the creator of Peaky Blinders.
The stakes rise as the last two Spirits visit Scrooge. He faces the impact of his actions.
Miserly Ebenezer Scrooge needs some CBeebies magic to help him share the joy of Christmas!

synopses.editorial: Miserly Ebenezer Scrooge needs some CBeebies magic!
synopses.small: Miserly Ebenezer Scrooge needs some CBeebies magic to help him share the joy of Christmas!
The Cornley Polytechnic Drama Society hijack a BBC production of A Christmas Carol.

synopses.editorial: A festive tale. Sort of. Cornley Polytechnic Drama Society force their way back on TV
synopses.small: The Cornley Polytechnic Drama Society hijack a BBC production of A Christmas Carol.
Documentary looking into a 2012 acid attack on Naomi Oni.

initial_children.title: Acid Attack: My Story
initial_children.editorial_subtitle: A personal tale of betrayal, deceit and vengeful violence

synopses.small: Documentary looking into a 2012 acid attack on Naomi Oni.
Celebrity chefs try out different recipes from around the world.
Rachel Khoo heads to Malaysia to explore one of the world's most exciting cuisines.
The ultimate guide to a countryside winter featuring wildlife, food and gardening.
Jules Hudson learns about the health benefits of open-water winter swimming.
Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city.
Abney and Teal construct a dragon but Neep finds it too scary.
Eye to eye with the unknown - the world's wildest continent.
Black rhinos reveal a lighter side to their character as they gather around a waterhole.
Afua Hirsch meets creatives reinventing culture in Nigeria, South Africa and Morocco.

synopses.editorial: 3/3 South Africa. From the streets to the surf, a new creative era is emerging
synopses.small: Afua discovers new creativity in art, music and theatre in South Africa’s townships.
Sophie is beginning to remember a formative holiday she took as a child.

synopses.editorial: Paul Mescal stars. An intimate portrait on the moments that make and break family bonds
synopses.small: Sophie is beginning to remember a formative holiday she took as a child.

elements.title: Agatha Christie: Lucy Worsley on the Mystery Queen

synopses.small: Lucy Worsley discovers the origins of Agatha Christie's macabre magic.

initial_children.title: Agatha Christie: Lucy Worsley on the Mystery Queen
initial_children.subtitle: Series 1: 3. Unfinished Portrait

synopses.editorial: 3/3 Unfinished Portrait. Personal happiness led to a golden age for Christie’s writing
synopses.small: Lucy examines Agatha Christie’s later life, discovering how she became the queen of crime.
Get behind the filter at Scotland’s biggest influencer agency.

synopses.editorial: 10/10 Feel Good Festival ends summer on a high, while Amy gets the results of her scan
synopses.small: Amy gets the results of her scan, and the agency end their summer with Feel Good Festival.
Mark Gatiss presents chilling Christmas stories for a cold winter’s night.

synopses.editorial: Lot No 249. Bringing a breath of life to a bag of bones. A classic Conan Doyle chiller
synopses.small: Can experiments bring the breath of life to the horrifying bag of bones, Lot No 249?
Neil Oliver's epic story of how Britain and its people came to be
Neil Oliver explores a recently-discovered, 5,000-year-old temple in Orkney.
The story of those who lived in one house, from the time it was built until now.
David traces our house from the Second World War to the millennium.
Innovative series featuring interviews recorded at the height of the Aids crisis.
Deaths from Aids continue to climb before miracle drugs are finally found.
The story of one of Britain's most notorious and astonishing miscarriages of justice.
The families begin a campaign to have the convictions of the Cardiff Five overturned.
Sparky autistic girl Addie wants a memorial for the witches of her home village.
Addie makes a final bid for justice – has she done enough?
Alex Brooker examines his disability to acknowledge how much it impacts on who he is.
Alex Brooker examines his disability to acknowledge how much it impacts on who he is.
CBeebies stars perform a pantomime adaptation of Lewis Carroll's classic tale.

synopses.editorial: Alice learns to use her imagination on a journey through Wonderland.
synopses.small: CBeebies stars perform a pantomime adaptation of Lewis Carroll's classic tale.
Can Charlie help his family run a seaside B&B while staying out of trouble?

synopses.editorial: Charlie goes into business as a shopping mall Santa.
synopses.small: Charlie goes into business as a shopping mall Santa.
Amanda Holden and Alan Carr join forces to bring crumbling Italian homes back to life.

synopses.editorial: 8/8 On the home stretch – the big reveal and an emotional farewell to Tuscany
synopses.small: Amanda and Alan renovate the kitchen and throw an emotional farewell party.

elements.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby

synopses.small: Take a look behind the scenes at some of the most extraordinary hotels across the globe.

initial_children.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
initial_children.subtitle: Series 5: 8. Hotel Hubertus, Italian Alps

synopses.editorial: At Hotel Hubertus. Behind the scenes of a family resort in a majestic mountain setting
synopses.small: Monica and Rob visit Hotel Hubertus - a spectacular Alpine resort run by a local family.
Bruce Parry embarks on an epic adventure in the Amazon.
Bruce Parry begins an adventure in the Amazon, following the river from source to sea.
Simon Reeve begins his most ambitious journey yet, travelling the length of the Americas.
In this fifth leg, Simon travels across Central America from the Caribbean to the Pacific.
A twisted comedy thriller about obsessive friendship, maternal paranoia – and a dead cat.
Nic’s secret is catching up with her, and she’s worried she’s a bad mum.
Classic Shakespeare play adapted for television by Russell T Davies.

synopses.editorial: A big, bold adaptation of Shakespeare with a stellar cast, danger, jokes and fun
synopses.small: Classic Shakespeare play adapted for television by Russell T Davies.
CBeebies stars perform William Shakespeare's famous comedy play.

synopses.editorial: Fairies, magic, celebration and comical confusion!
synopses.small: CBeebies stars perform William Shakespeare's famous comedy play.
In 1975, George and Kathy Lutz are driven out from their dream home in just 28 days.

synopses.editorial: 4/4 The Feedback Loop. Sequels, conspiracies and secrets of George Lutz's past revealed
synopses.small: The success of the Amityville Horror reinvents the haunted house for a new generation.
Amy Dowden gives people the chance to learn a spectacular dance routine.

synopses.editorial: 4/4 Football – and footwork. Two huge Wrexham fans are after a fantastic first dance
synopses.small: Amy helps a football-mad bride and groom with a first dance with extra special meaning.
